mapper.sql: oid, stu_id, year, month, rank, status
mapper.insert:
insert into t_score_month_sort
oid,
stu_id,
year,
month,
rank,
#{oid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{stuId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{year,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{month,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{rank,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update t_score_month_sort
stu_id = #{stuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
year = #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER},
month = #{month,jdbcType=INTEGER},
rank = #{rank,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where oid = #{oid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_score_month_sort set stu_id = #{stuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, year = #{name,jdbcType=INTEGER}, month = #{month,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rank = #{rank,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, where oid = #{oid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select count(td.oid) from t_score_month_sort as td where 1=1

select td.* from t_score_month_sort as td where 1=1 order by td.oid desc
limit #{start},#{length}
